apps.title: hashID
apps.desc: Web-version of the original python tool built with GitHub Pages. Identify hash types and share results without having to install python.

apps.title: YouTube Geofind
apps.desc: Web-app to find geo-tagged YouTube videos by channel uploads, topic, and any location you choose. Over 80,000 visitors.

apps.title: Paint.NET Plugin Index
apps.desc: Web-app to search and discover plugins in the Paint.NET forums. Built and collaborated with Scott Stringer. Currently embedded within the Paint.NET forums under Scott Stringer's plugin index post.

apps.title: YouTube Comment Suite
apps.desc: JavaFX desktop-app to download comments across all videos on entire channels stored in a database for easy searching.

apps.title: JExplorer
apps.desc: JavaFX desktop-app that combines file traversal of the local system with SMB and FTP network drive scanning.

apps.title: Windows SMB Cracker
apps.desc: JavaFX desktop-app that provides remote password bruteforcing of smb-enabled Windows machines.

apps.title: Perry Co. R.R. & N&SV R.R. Geodata
apps.desc: QGIS mapping project tracing railroads torn up in the 1930s in Perry County, PA. Data files from the project provided for download.
